entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon and ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Fog patches developing this morning and dissipating late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm inland. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3 except plus 1 along the coast.
